snippet.title: The Red Lantern - Launch Trailer - Out Now!
snippet.description:
The Red Lantern is available now on Nintendo Switch and PC on the Epic Games Store!

Adopt a team of sled dogs! Live off the land as you hunt, fish, & scavenge. Meet the wildlife, pet the dogs and find your way home as you navigate the Alaskan bush in this rogue-lite, narrative game.

The Red Lantern, a dog-sledding story of survival, is out now.

Switch NA: https://bit.ly/34AMmun
Switch Europe: https://bit.ly/37v7KUX
PC (Epic Games Store): https://bit.ly/3lmUQwe
